question: 7th meeting of Eminent Persons Group on Nepal-India relations has begun in ___________.
explanation: 7th meeting of Eminent Persons Group on Nepal-India relations has begun in Kathmandu. Representatives from Nepal & India will deliberate up on various bilateral issues including Peace & Friendship treaty, trade, transit & border. EPG is a joint mechanism consisting experts & intellectuals from India & Nepal to provide suggestions for updating existing bilateral treaties b/w the two countries.
